snippet: The N.R.A. has attacked President Obama’s nominee for surgeon general, and now Democratic leaders might knuckle under the pressure.
abstract: Editorial criticizes campaign by the National Rifle Assn that is exerting pressure on some Democrats to oppose Dr Vivek Murthy, Pres Obama's nominee to become surgeon general, because of his attitudes on gun control; holds that Murthy is impeccably qualified and represents no threat to the gun rights of law-abiding citizens.
lead_paragraph: The N.R.A. has attacked President Obama’s nominee for surgeon general, and now Democratic leaders might knuckle under the pressure.

headline.main: The Gun Lobby’s Latest Bizarre Crusade
